name: The Brew
description:
Welcome to the 🧛‍♀️Night College🐺 class of 1822 Reunion Hosted at The Brew ☕Coffee, 🍵Tea, or 🩸whatever else you consume🎙Open Mic Night🎙

               

You are the bartender at The Brew, a favorite for many werewolves, vampires, etc.  With ingredients like 🌙💧moon water, 🐕hair of the dog, 😭regret, 🕷spiders, 👀eyes, and even a few ⚡bolts of lightning! Follow eccentric recipes and mix them up in a classic cauldron, or a shaker, or our brand newEspresso Machine

Jason Rand - Programming, UX, Dr. Frankenstein

Catherine Rand - Art

DanzMacabre - Music, SFX, Various Voices

Jillian Wagner - Story, Addition Lyrics, SFX, Various Voices
